EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Bloodline
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Select a Draconic Bloodline to embody. No matter what color you pick, you gain:
You gain the Magical Training Feat.
Each Core Ability you take in the tree including this one, grants the following:
+1 Epic bonus to Spell DCs +50 Spell Points +5 Spell power associated with your chosen elements Spell power +5 Universal Spell power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Heritage I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: -5% Spell Point cost on all spells. Your spells no longer need material components, as if you had the Eschew Materials feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Elemental Blood
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: -5% Spell Point cost on all spells. When casting spells that match your Draconic Bloodline you have a 15% chance to gain 10 temporary Hit Points per character level that last for 10 seconds. This can only trigger once per 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Heritage II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: -5% Spell Point cost on all spells. Your Draconic Heritage I's Eschew Materials is improved: your spells no longer need special material components.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Perception
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Spot, Search, and Reflex saving throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragonhide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Armor Class and Fortitude saving throws. Rank 3: You no longer fail Fortitude saves automatically by rolling a natural 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Breath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select your Dragon Breath Epic Strike - a fearsome Draconic Breath Attack!

EnhancementSelection.Name: Black Dragon Breath
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Conjure forth a torrent of Acid to melt your enemies. Deals 1d6+5 Acid damage per Character Level to all enemies caught within the spray. DC: 20 + Max(Int, Wis, Cha) Mod + Conjuration bonuses + Breath Weapon Bonuses. Metamagics: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify Cost: 25 Spell Points Cooldown: 12 seconds
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Blue Dragon Breath
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Conjure forth a galvanic storm to electrocute your enemies. Deals 1d6+5 Electric damage per Character Level to all enemies caught within the sparks. DC: 20 + Max(Int, Wis, Cha) Mod + Conjuration bonuses + Breath Weapon Bonuses. Metamagics: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify Cost: 25 Spell Points Cooldown: 12 seconds
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Green Dragon Breath
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Conjure forth a wave of poison to infect your enemies. Deals 1d6+5 Poison damage per Character Level to all enemies caught within the area. DC: 20 + Max(Int, Wis, Cha) Mod + Conjuration bonuses + Breath Weapon Bonuses. Metamagics: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify Cost: 25 Spell Points Cooldown: 12 seconds
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Description:

DC: 20 + Max(Int, Wis, Cha) Mod + Conjuration bonuses + Breath Weapon Bonuses. Metamagics: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify Cost: 25 Spell Points Cooldown: 12 seconds
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shadow Dragon Breath
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Conjure forth a wave of shadow to terrify your enemies. Deals 1d6+5 Negative damage per Character Level to all enemies caught within the blast. DC: 20 + Max(Int, Wis, Cha) Mod + Conjuration bonuses + Breath Weapon Bonuses. Metamagics: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify Cost: 25 Spell Points Cooldown: 12 seconds
Every Epic strike shares a cooldown with every other Epic Strike. Using this ability will put every Epic Strike onto this ability's cooldown.

EnhancementSelection.Name: White Dragon Breath
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Epic Strike: Conjure forth a spray of frost to freeze your enemies. Deals 1d6+5 Cold damage per Character Level to all enemies caught within the ice. DC: 20 + Max(Int, Wis, Cha) Mod + Conjuration bonuses + Breath Weapon Bonuses. Metamagics: Empower, Maximize, Quicken, Intensify Cost: 25 Spell Points Cooldown: 12 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragon Scales
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Arcane Studies
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Concentration and Spellcraft, +[1/2/3] Use Magic Device. Rank 3: +5 Spell Power of your Draconic Heritage and +5 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Presence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Breath Weapon DCs. Rank 3: Immunity to Fear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Rage
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You may now cast spells while Raging.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Attune the Arcane
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Draconic Destiny Mantle: Offensive spells you cast deal an additional 1d6+6 bonus damage per Caster Level in the elemental damage of your Draconic Bloodline. This has a cooldown of 5 seconds.

Stance.Name: Draconic Destiny Mantle
Stance.Description: Draconic Destiny Mantle: Offensive spells you cast have a 25% chance to deal 1d6+6 bonus damage per caster level in the elemental damage of your Draconic Bloodline. This has a cooldown of 5 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Coalescence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You bypass the first [5/10/15] points of Damage Reduction with your spells. Rank 3: +5 Spell Power of your Draconic Heritage element and +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Conduit
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Double the Implement bonus of Quarterstaves you wield.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Scales of the Dragon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this to shroud yourself in the Scales of a Dragon temporarily. This has two components - firstly, it absorbs 15 points of damage per Character Level in ablative protection. Secondly, it shields you from 50% of the Elemental Damage of your dragon type. The Elemental Damage shield will persist even if the ablative protection is depleted. Both effects last for 5 minutes. Costs 30 Spell Points. Cooldown: 30 Seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Daunting Roar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Breath Weapons (including your Dragon Breath Epic Strike) have a 25% chance to paralyze enemies caught within them with fear for 6 seconds with no save. This can only affect each monster once - once they have been feared successfully, successive attempts will fail. Enemies that are immune to fear are immune to this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Inevitable
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Attune the Arcane Destiny Mantle now instead applies a Damage Over Time effect that deals its full damage 3 additional times after application, for a total of 4 ticks of damage beyond the first, application damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Arcane Spellsword
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Imbue Dice

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Draconic Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Spell School to enhance.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Conjuration Spell DCs

EnhancementSelection.Name: Evocation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Evocation Spell DCs

EnhancementSelection.Name: Necromancy
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Necromancy Spell DCs

EnhancementSelection.Name: Transmutation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Transmutation Spell DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Pull from the Wellspring
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Wellspring of Power's duration is doubled. When you activate it, you gain +10 Temporary Spell Points per Character Level that last for the full, doubled duration.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Improve Dragon Breath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Improve your Dragon Breath Epic Strike!

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Burst
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Dragon Breath Epic Strike is modified to instead burst from within you, dealing 1d6+10 damage per caster Level to all nearby enemies.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Vortex
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Dragon Breath Epic Strike is modified to instead cause energies to swirl around you, dealing its damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds for 15 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Gaping Maw
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Dragon Breath Epic Strike now deals 1d6+10 damage per Caster Level.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragonspeed
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Attune the Arcane Destiny Mantle now grants you a 10% Spell Cooldown Reduction, the Mobile Spellcasting feat, and a 30% Enhancement bonus to Movement speed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Epic Improved Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Metamagic to improve

EnhancementSelection.Name: Epic Improved Enlarge
EnhancementSelection.Description: Enlarge: Using the Enlarge Spell Metamagic costs you [1/2/4] fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Epic Improved Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Quicken: Using the Quicken Spell Metamagic costs you [1/2/4] fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Epic Improved Metamagic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Metamagic to improve

EnhancementSelection.Name: Epic Improved Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Empower Metamagic by [2/4/6] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Epic Improved Intensify
EnhancementSelection.Description: Using the Intensify Spell Metamagic costs you [2/4/6] fewer Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Epic Improved Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Maximize Metamagic by [3/6/9] spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Bring About Destruction
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+10 Spell Power of your Draconic Element, +10 Universal Spell Power.
Your Eladar's Electric Surge, Niac's Biting Cold, Burning Blood, Enervation, and Venom Concentration spells now stack two additional times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Ruin Intensified
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Ruin and Greater Ruin now applies a secondary burst of damage based on your Draconic Bloodline. This scales with the appropriate Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Dragonform
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Epic Moment: Activate this ability to take on the aspect of your Draconic Bloodline. For 30 seconds, you gain the following:
You become immune to elemental damage of your Draconic Bloodline. If you are an Undead and aligned with Shadow Dragons, this does not apply to you. You gain DR 100/- and your Hit Points begin to regenerate at a fast rate. Your spells gain a 50% cost reduction. Your spells have a chance to turn a non-boss enemy to gold permanently, adding them to your hoard, with no save. Cooldown: 5 minutes.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Spread your Wings
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Draconic wings sprout from you and propel you forward a moderate distance. Cooldown 15 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Draconic Incarnation: Enhanced Draconic Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Spell DCs
